import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import {FormGroup, FormControl} from '@angular/forms' import {ActivatedRoute} from '@angular/router' //import {RestoService} from '../resto.service' @Component({ selector: 'app-update-resto', templateUrl: './update-resto.component.html', styleUrls: ['./update-resto.component.css'] }) export class UpdateRestoComponent { editResto = new FormGroup({ name: new FormControl(''), email: new FormControl(''), address: new FormControl('') }) constructor(private router: ActivatedRoute) {} ngOnInt(): void{ console.log(this.router.snapshot.params.id) } }
